name: mintlify-tsdocs
description: Read JSON files from api-extractor, generate documentation pages

scripts.build: tsc && cp -r src/schemas lib/ && cp -r src/components lib/
scripts.rebuild: bun run clean && bun run build
scripts.docs:generate: node ./bin/mintlify-tsdocs markdown -i docs/reference --tab-name Reference --group 'Code API' --menu --readme -o docs/reference --docs-json docs/docs.json
scripts.docs:verbose: bun run build && bun run docs:extract && bun run docs:generate
